name: INSTRUMENTS
template:
SELECT * from INSTRUMENTS
where NAME LIKE '{{payload.match}}%'
ORDER by NAME ASC

name: INSTRUMENT
template:
SELECT * from INSTRUMENTS
where ID = '{{req.params.id}}'
ORDER by NAME ASC

name: { "user" : "{{user}}" , "input" : { "text": "{{payload}}" } }
template: { "user" : "{{user}}" , "input" : { "text": "{{payload}}" } }

{{#payload}} {{/payload}}
Code Name Template Provider
{{Code}} {{Name}} {{ProductTemplate}} {{ProductProvider}}
